feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
